document_data.caption: A map of Triboar showing the Happy Horse Ranch in the southwest.
document_data.name: Happy Horse Ranch
document_data.mainbody: The '''Happy Horse Ranch''' was a family-owned business that operated in [[Triboar]] in the [[Dessarin Valley]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was owned and operated by [[Janele Karnveller]], who was aided by her three sons.
document_data.Inhabitants: Together, the Karnveller family bred, reared, and housed [[horse]]s that were later sold.
document_data.Structure: The ranch comprised two-story log-built house with an outhouse that served as the family home; a stone storehouse used to hold [[saddle]]s, [[Bit and bridle|bridles, bits, and reins]]; a stone stables leading to a fenced riding yard; and a fenced paddock that was used for grazing. It lay in the southwest of Triboar, south of [[Gwaeron's Slumber]].<ref>
